summary: A bounty Hunter seeks revenge for the murder of her family and prepares for a showdown with the powerful gang leader responsible for the slayings. She calls on old friends to stand with her in the fight.
cast: Sara Canning|John Pyper-Ferguson|Greyston Holt|Ryan Kennedy|Billy Zane|Kimberly Elise|Danny Glover|Julian Black Antelope|Diego Diablo Del Mar|Ian Kilburn|Brendan Fletcher|John Fasano|Cody Bass|Tom Carey|Lucy Harvey|Juan Riedinger|David LeReaney|Brendan Hunter|Kassia Warshawski|Chris Ippolito|Vanessa Holmes|Tayden Marks|Cameron Bancroft|Calista Schmidt|Eugene Brave Rock|Terry A. Brown|Dave El Wray|Jeff Hanni|Trevor Woroby
title: La ley de Hannah
